inputs.title: Alarm inputs
inputs.description: Choose how many alarm inputs to monitor and specify their identifiers. Inputs must be between 1 and {max_input}.

data_description.count: Total number of alarm inputs to configure.
data_description.input_sensors: Provide comma-separated alarm input numbers or ranges (e.g. 1-4,6).

input_names.title: Name alarm inputs
input_names.description: Assign a descriptive name to each of the {count} selected alarm inputs.

outputs.title: Outputs
outputs.description: Choose how many outputs to expose and specify their identifiers. Outputs must be between 1 and {max_output}.

data_description.count: Total number of outputs to configure.
data_description.output_switches: Provide comma-separated output numbers or ranges (e.g. 1-4,6).

output_names.title: Name outputs
output_names.description: Assign a descriptive name to each of the {count} selected outputs.

panels.title: Select panel
panels.description: Choose the panel to edit. Use the options menu to add a new panel if needed.

panel_edit.title: Edit panel
panel_edit.description: Assign alarm sectors to each arming mode for {panel_name}. Sectors must be between 1 and {max_sector}.

data_description.entity_id_suffix: Optional suffix appended to the alarm panel entity ID.
data_description.away: Provide a comma-separated list of sectors to arm when using away mode.
data_description.home: Provide a comma-separated list of sectors to arm when using home mode.
data_description.night: Provide a comma-separated list of sectors to arm when using night mode.

user_codes.title: User codes
user_codes.description: Enter one code per line. Leave empty to disable code verification.
